Package it.polimi.ingsw.clients.viewer.controllers

Class BoardsController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.clients.viewer.controllers.BoardsController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GUIController
public class BoardsController extends Object implements GUIController
Class BoardsController is the GUI controller of every player's board. It uses FXML files for JavaFX
Author:
Alessio Piovesan
